mapper.update: update yw_app_behavior set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, api_id = #{apiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, app_database_field_id = #{appDatabaseFieldId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, behavior_url = #{behaviorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, req_method = #{reqMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, behavior_definition = #{behaviorDefinition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, behavior_style = #{behaviorStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
